Name: The Last of Waifus
About the game: The Last of Waifus is a third-person shooter game in post-apocalyptic theme. You are playing as the last Waifu clearing out the fallen city from Infected whose only target is you. Enjoy the thrill - endlessly, if you dare.. Do not expect it to ever get better, though. Features: third-person shooter dynamic action gameplay post-apocalyptic world Add the game to your Wishlist and be the first one in line! /
